mimic.title: LSB Steganography Lab
mimic.description: Hide encrypted payloads inside innocuous images.
mimic.warningText: Uses LSB (Least Significant Bit) Steganography. Output images must be saved as PNG. Cloud compression (FB, Twitter, WhatsApp default) will destroy data.
mimic.encryptionComplete: Encryption complete. Please download the PNG.
mimic.dataFound: Data found! Switch to Vault to decrypt.
mimic.noDataFound: No valid data found or error reading image.
mimic.enterPayload: Enter text to hide in image...
mimic.payloadReady: PAYLOAD READY :: WAITING FOR CARRIER IMAGE
